replies.msg:
I was glad to work w/ @marcorubio, @SenatorCardin, & @SenatorMenendez on the #HongKongHumanRightsandDemocracyAct & to see it signed into law. It is no surprise the CCP is retaliating against organizations that stand for everything it fears – freedom, democracy, & human rights.

From the beginning, the Chinese Communist Party has claimed that outside influences are behind the #HongKongProtests, but the overwhelming support for freedom in last week’s elections affirms that is a blatant lie.
